widgets.name: QU Released within 60 Days Install Status

trend_definition.filter: airwatch.windowspatch.device_enrollment_status = 'Enrolled'  AND  airwatch.windowspatch.winpatch_publish_date WITHIN 60 days  AND  airwatch.windowspatch.winpatch_update_status NOT IN ( 'Removed' , 'Unknown' )  AND  airwatch.windowspatch.winpatch_update_classification NOT IN ( 'FeatureUpdates' )
